name: power-plant-pass
effect: Permits entry to the Kalos Power Plant.
short_effect: Permits entry to the Kalos Power Plant.

flavor_text.sun_moon: This pass serves as an ID card for gaining access to the power plant that lies along Route 13.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: This pass serves as an ID card for gaining access to the power plant that lies along Route 13.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: This pass serves as an ID card for gaining access to the Power Plant that lies along Route 13.
